price: Sema: Nyinyi hamtaulizwa kwa makosa tuliyo yafanya, wala sisi hatutaulizwa kwa mnayo yatenda nyinyi.
arabic: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie: Nyinyi hamuulizwi khabari ya madhambi tuliyo yafanya sisi; wala sisi hatuulizwi khabari ya vitendo vyenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul lā tus'alūna ʿammā ajramnā walā nus'alu ʿammā taʿmalūna
